name: dfs.bytes-per-checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  dfs.stream-buffer-size

name: dfs.namenode.list.cache.pools.num.responses
description:
This value controls the number of cache pools that the NameNode will
    send over the wire in response to a listPools RPC.

name: dfs.datanode.directoryscan.interval
description:
Interval in seconds for Datanode to scan data directories and
  reconcile the difference between blocks in memory and on the disk.
  Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
  in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
  is assumed.

name: mapreduce.map.maxattempts
description:
Expert: The maximum number of attempts per map task.
  In other words, framework will try to execute a map task these many number
  of times before giving up on it.

name: mapreduce.task.exit.timeout.check-interval-ms
description:
The interval in milliseconds between which the MR framework
  checks if task attempts stay in finishing state for too long.
